page.title: 12Tourism in Colmonell
page.content: Tourism is an important aspect of life in Colmonell.It helps to support the two hotels,two shops,garage and caravan park that lie within the village. There a number of holiday houses in the village where people come to relax far from the rigours of town and city life. Many of the tourists who visit the village do so to enjoy the good fishing to be had in the river Stinchar where catches of salmon and sea trout are to be found if conditions are right. A lot of people who holiday in Colmonell do so simply to enjoy the peace and quiet of the countryside and soak in the beauty of the surrounding hills and valleys.
